version_description:
1. Fixed an issue with the link to the website
2. Two new colors for free
3. If you have any questions or suggestions, send us a feedback
Bug fix and optimizations for new iPhone size

Many features and improvements have been implemented as a result of your requests received via email, in order to make X-Key as complete as possible. Keep writing to us, your suggestions are important.

- trackpad bug fix

Many features and improvements have been implemented as a result of your requests received via email, in order to make X-Key as complete as possible. Keep writing to us, your suggestions are important.

- general improvements

- Every New Emoji in iOS 12.1
- Optimizations for iPhoneXS Max - iPhone XR
- General improvements and minor bug fixes

Many features and improvements have been implemented as a result of your requests received via email, in order to make X-Key as complete as possible. Keep writing to us, your suggestions are important.

The latest version has solved some problems that have occurred between X-Key and some editing apps on iPhone Xs Max.
If you have problems using X-Key with an app, please report it to us.

Fixed an issue that occurred with some editing apps on iPhone Xs Max.

If you have problems using X-Key with an app, please report it to us.
